Package view.GUI

Class BoardView

java.lang.Object
view.GUI.BoardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BoardView extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the frame of the board in the Graphic User Interface

      column - an int that represents a column

    • setCanPick

      public void setCanPick(boolean canPick)
      Method used to set a tile to one that can be picked.
      Parameters:
      canPick - is a boolean, true if a tile can be picked, false otherwise
